subject: Football
Coaches and Managers
Blacks
Affirmative Action
Hiring and Promotion
lead_paragraph: Todd Bowles, the Jets’ new coach, represents a success under a rule requiring teams to interview minority candidates for head coaching jobs, but minority groups are still underrepresented.
snippet: Todd Bowles, the Jets’ new coach, represents a success under a rule requiring teams to interview minority candidates for head coaching jobs, but minority groups are still underrepresented.
